org.araneaframework.framework.filter
Class StandardStatisticFilterService

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.framework.core.BaseFilterService
              org.araneaframework.framework.filter.StandardStatisticFilterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, FilterService, java.io.Serializable, Service
public class StandardStatisticFilterService
extends BaseFilterService

A filter that logs the time it takes for the child service to complete its action method (serving the request). The logging statement can have a message set via setMessage().

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)

action

protected void action(Path path,
                      InputData input,
                      OutputData output)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from class: BaseService
Services provide their services through the action method. An implementation of a non-composite service like BaseService uses the action method to hook in the middle of the action routing and provide filtering, logging etc.

Overrides:
